bibl.title: The Antinoopolis Illustrated Herbal (P. Johnson + PAntin. 3.214 = MP3 2095).
bibl.note: Revised edition of P. Johnson + P. Ant. III, 214, fr. d (= Marganne 30; Mertens-Pack3 2095). Antinoopolis, late IV / early V AD. Examines in particular the relationship between the Antinoopolis Herbal and a treatise on astrological botany, the De virtutibus herbarum.
bibl.seg: LEITH David, The Antinoopolis Illustrated Herbal (P. Johnson + PAntin. 3.214 = MP3 2095).

Revised edition of P. Johnson + P. Ant. III, 214, fr. d (= Marganne 30; Mertens-Pack3 2095). Antinoopolis, late IV / early V AD. Examines in particular the relationship between the Antinoopolis Herbal and a treatise on astrological botany, the De virtutibus herbarum.
